intro.title: Scala && Typescript Fullstack Developper
intro.currentPosition: At for 2 years now.
body: I am working on a GraphQL gateway and on the main REST API behind all our frontend applications in a team of 20 developpers
Working with Scalable Reactive systems on a daily basis, with the help of Play! Framework, Akka, Kafka, Cassandra and Redis.
Convinced by Agile developpement cycle and TDD practices. I'm used to working with AWS, Docker and Immutable State infrastructure (Salt Stack and recently, Kubernetes)
I used to be a Frontend consultant working on many Canal+'s technical backoffices.
I was hired after some month in an Internship while working on an Engineering Degree at EPITA.
I mainly do Scala but I am from a Frontend world I am still working on javascript libraries for CanalPlus frontend developpers and some R&D frontend applications.

experiences.description: Within a crew of 50 persons inside vack of our video streaming plateform.I am challenged by performance and quality on a daily basic., I am working on various projects written in Scala, Java and Typescript . In an Agile, Scrum and eXtreme Programming environement i can pick up various tasks and occasionally do DevOps tasks, RUN (production operations), peer programming, javascript libraries, CLI tools, creating a software factory with CI and CD.

projects.title: HAPI
projects.description: HAPI is Canal+'s backend REST API it handles content catalog, user curation, video plays, and data aggregations, rights and portal management for catchup and live TV of Canal+ group. Wth a very high request load and a diversity of web cliens (mobile, pc, TVs, etc ...).

projects.title: REAP
projects.description: REAP is the centralizer of many Canal+ data sources (Plurimedia, CSA, ImDB, Internal tools, etc..) and is a journalized referential database, Besides HAPI, it is also used for external catalogs (Siri, Google, ISPs, Offline mode, etc ...)

experiences.description: Inside of OMNILOG I was a contract developper during 6 months working on a PHP/Zend Framework internal softeware before being sent to the clients office in Canal+ where I finished some tasks on the internal project before working on HAPI and REAP (Details in Canal+ experience).
